en.title: FE Welcomes QP Wearer, LTO Chief of Philippines, Mr Bert Suansing!
en.content: Earlier this month (November) in Manila, FE leader Kenneth Lee had the opportunity of presenting the wonderful qualities of Fusion Excel International's Quantum Pendant to the Chief of the Land Transport Office of the Philippines, Mr Bert Suansing. A speechless Mr Suansing experienced personally the instant and powerful effects of the Quantum Pendant on his balance, strength and flexibility. A keen golfer, Mr Suansing duly and without hesitation availed for himself a set of pendants! We wish Mr Bert Suansing all the very best and welcome him to a new world of health benefits with FE's Scalar Energy Quantum Pendant!
